page.title: 19Wethersfield Air Base cont.
page.content: The Fire station is always alert ready for any fires and floods.It has three fire engines which all carry foam and water.There is a room where they can sleep when on night shifts. There is a control room where they work and a room where they can go to play American pool and watch T.V. The control tower has three seats and three switchboards,but the average number of people in there to control a plane coming in is two.The Base has the longest runway in England. There is a police station on the Base and they have two cells.The prison keeps all its criminal records locked up in a concreted wall room with the ammunition .It has three burglar alarms in the room,one at the door and one on the floor and one on the safe. .
